title: Letter Case, 18th century
medium:
Medium: silk and metal-wrapped silk embroidery on silk foundation
Technique: embroidered in stem, satin, running and couching stitches on plain weave foundation
creditline: Gift of Eleanor and Sarah Hewitt
description: White silk letter case embroidered in polychrome silks and metal threads with a basket of flowers, in the same design on both sides. Fastening of silk and metal braid with tassels; lined with pink silk.

tombstone.epitaph:
Letter Case, 18th century.
18th century. Medium: silk and metal-wrapped silk embroidery on silk foundation
Technique: embroidered in stem, satin, running and couching stitches on plain weave foundation. Gift of Eleanor and Sarah Hewitt. 1925-2-65.
